title: Verify: Fox Sports Go can be accessed while the Apple TV device is connected wirelessly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their Apple TV
AND their Apple TV  device is currently connected to a wireless network
AND the "Fox Sports Go" app is present in the device Apps Menu
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects Fox Sports Go from the device Apps menu
custom_expected: THEN the Fox Sports Go app will open successful

title: Verify: Fox Sports Go can be accessed while the Apple TV device is connected using a wired connection
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their Apple TV device
AND their Apple TV device is currently connected to a wired network
AND the "Fox Sports Go" app is present in the device Apps Menu
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects Fox Sports Go from the device Apps menu
custom_expected: THEN the Fox Sports Go app will open successfully

title: Unauthenticated account is allowed to browse content items found within the Fox Sports Go App
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Fox Sports Go app has been accessed
AND has not authenticated their Cable Provider account details
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates through Content Files 
AND the user navigates through any/all Content items found within the App
custom_expected:
The user will be able to freely browse the app's Content item thumbnails
AND will be prompted with Content files that contain "Key" icons on top of their photo tile

title: "Activate" Notification for Cable Provider (Live Feed) - Web Flow
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Fox Sports Go app has been accessed
AND has not authenticated their Cable Provider account details
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates through Content Files 
AND the user selects Any Content items found within the App
AND the Content is now playing (live)
THEN presses select to ENTER and PLAY the media content
AND is prompted with the "Activate" Cable Authentication screen
custom_expected: User will be prompted with the Cable Authorization "Activate" screen, with full CODE and website details

title: "Activate" Notification for Cable Provider (Future Feed) - Web Flow
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the Fox Sports Go app has been accessed
AND has not authenticated their Cable Provider account details
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates through Content Files 
AND the user selects Any Content items found within the App
AND the Content is scheduled for a future time
THEN presses select to ENTER
custom_expected: THEN The user will be displayed  "[Show] will start [Day] at [Time]"

title: Verify: TV Provider Sign in page is displayed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the user has the FOX Sports Go! App installed
AND the user is not signed-in
custom_steps:
WHEN the user launches FOX Sports Go! App
AND the user swipes up on remote touchpad
AND the user navigates to and activates "Settings"
AND the user navigates to and activates TV Provider Sign in button
custom_expected:
Then License Plate view is displayed
AND "Sign in with your TV provider on your desktop or mobile device at: HTTP:foxsportsgo.com/activate and enter ??????? 
for more help or info please visit http://www.foxsportsgo.com/support"

title: Verify: MVPD Logos are present on the TV Provider sign in page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the user has the FOX Sports Go! App installed
AND the user is not signed-in
custom_steps:
WHEN the user launches FOX Sports Go! App
AND the user swipes up on remote touchpad
AND the user navigates to and activates "Settings"
AND the user navigates to and activates TV Provider Sign in button
AND the user annotates the code on screen
AND the user navigates to http://www.foxsportsgo.com/activate with a web browser
And the user enters code annotated in the section provided
custom_expected:
THEN TV Provider - Sign In page is displayed
AND the user will be presented with TV Provider sign in section that contains ten MVPD logos

title: Verify: MVPD's Sign in Webview
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the user has the FOX Sports Go! App installed
AND the user launches FOX Sports Go! App
AND the user has not signed in
custom_steps:
WHEN the user launches FOX Sports Go! App
AND the user swipes up on remote touchpad
AND the user navigates to and activates "Settings"
AND the user navigates to and activates TV Provider Sign in button
AND the user annotates the code on screen
AND the user navigates to http://www.foxsportsgo.com/activate with a web browser
And the user enters code annotated in the section provided
AND the user selects any of the MVPD button
AND the user enters MVPD credentials https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?spaceKey=FOX&title=MVPD+Test+Credentials+and+Comcast+Requirements
custom_expected:
THEN Web View - Dialog displayed to user "SUCCESS! You have successfully activated FOX Sports GO."
AND Device View - Dialog displayed to user " Sign in Successful!"

AND MVPD logo - after user presses ok to confirm log in , swipe up on controller to verify MVPD logo in top right of menu bar

title: Verify: "More TV Providers" button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the user has the FOX Sports Go! App installed
AND user is not Logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN the user launches FOX Sports Go! App
AND the user swipes up on remote touchpad
AND the user navigates to and activates "Settings"
AND the user navigates to and activates TV Provider Sign in button
AND the user annotates the code on screen
AND the user navigates to http://www.foxsportsgo.com/activate with a web browser
And the user enters code annotated in the section provided
AND the user is taken to the TV Provider Sign in page
AND the user navigates to and activates  "More TV Providers"
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be redirected to Kaleidoscope flow
AND the user is redirected to more tv providers page that displays a list of more TV Providers in alphabetical order, grouped by leading letter
AND tapping the tv provider name will direct the user to that MVPD's official authentication screen.

title: Verify: "More TV Providers" page is functional
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the user has the FOX Sports Go! App installed
AND user is not Logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN the user launches FOX Sports Go! App
AND the user swipes up on remote touchpad
AND the user navigates to and activates "Settings"
AND the user navigates to and activates TV Provider Sign in button
AND the user annotates the code on screen
AND the user navigates to http://www.foxsportsgo.com/activate with a web browser
And the user enters code annotated in the section provided
AND the user is taken to the TV Provider Sign in page
AND the user navigates to and activates "More TV Providers"
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to scroll through the list by swiping up/down
AND the user can tap on any TV Provider listed

title: Verify: Search functionality on 'More TV Providers" page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the user has the FOX Sports Go! App installed
AND user is not Logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN the user launches FOX Sports Go! App
AND the user swipes up on remote touchpad
AND the user navigates to and activates "Settings"
AND the user navigates to and activates TV Provider Sign in button
AND the user annotates the code on screen
AND the user navigates to http://www.foxsportsgo.com/activate with a web browser
And the user enters code annotated in the section provided
AND the user is taken to the TV Provider Sign in page
AND the user navigates to and activates "More TV Providers
AND user navigates to and activates the search field
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to manually search for their tv providers
AND keyboard is displayed when the user clicks the search field.

title: Verify: Search auto-populates on "More TV Providers" page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the user has the FOX Sports Go! App installed
AND user is not Logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN the user launches FOX Sports Go! App
AND the user swipes up on remote touchpad
AND the user navigates to and activates "Settings"
AND the user navigates to and activates TV Provider Sign in button
AND the user annotates the code on screen
AND the user navigates to http://www.foxsportsgo.com/activate with a web browser
And the user enters code annotated in the section provided
AND the user is taken to the TV Provider Sign in page
AND the user navigates to and activates "More TV Providers"
AND the user clicks the search field
AND the user inputs any TV Provider name
custom_expected:
THEN suggestions should automatically begin to populate as soon as the user inputs a character
AND results should reflect string search as well as keyword matches (requires additional mapping), for example, Comcast will return Xfinity or Cablevision will return Optimum.

title: Verify: Search displays "No matches found" if or when the searched input was not found
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the user has the FOX Sports Go! App installed
AND user is not Logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN the user launches FOX Sports Go! App
AND the user swipes up on remote touchpad
AND the user navigates to and activates "Settings"
AND the user navigates to and activates TV Provider Sign in button
AND the user annotates the code on screen
AND the user navigates to http://www.foxsportsgo.com/activate with a web browser
And the user enters code annotated in the section provided
AND the user is taken to the TV Provider Sign in page
AND the user navigates to and activates "More TV Providers"
AND the user click in  the search field
AND enters a value that is not in the list
custom_expected: THEN the screen displays a message that reads "No matches found" below the search field.

title: Verify: MVPD "More TV Providers" MVPD sign in screen is displayed (from Search)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the user has the FOX Sports Go! App installed
AND user is not Logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN the user launches FOX Sports Go! App
AND the user swipes up on remote touchpad
AND the user navigates to and activates "Settings"
AND the user navigates to and activates TV Provider Sign in button
AND the user annotates the code on screen
AND the user navigates to http://www.foxsportsgo.com/activate with a web browser
And the user enters code annotated in the section provided
AND the user is taken to the TV Provider Sign in page
AND the user navigates to and activates "More TV Providers"
AND user selects the search field
AND enters a TV provider
AND selects one
custom_expected: THEN user should be taken to the MVPD's official auth screen

title: Verify: MVPD log in functionality
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the user has the FOX Sports Go! App installed
AND user is not Logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN the app is launched
AND user taps the Drawer/ Navigation (Hamburger icon)
AND user taps the Sign in with your TV Provider option that links to authentication view
AND selects one of the eight logos displayed MVPDs
custom_expected: THEN the official MVPD auth screen for that respective selection should be displayed

title: Verify: Fanhood
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the user has the FOX Sports Go! App installed
AND the user launches FOX Sports Go! App
AND the user is signed in with MVPD login
AND the user has not signed in to Fox Sport Sign In (Fan Hood)
Favorite teams indicated in Fan Hood
custom_steps:
WHEN the user launches FOX Sports Go! App
AND the user swipes up on remote touchpad
AND the user navigates to and activates "Settings"
AND the user navigates to and activates "FOX Sports Sign in" 
AND enters credentials - Credentials (testertester@gmail.com/bas3ba11)
AND user confirms Sign in Successful overlay
AND user navigates to Main Menu by swiping up
AND user navigates to and activates "Search" sub menu
custom_expected:
THEN A horizontal list of User favorited teams will appear below search keyboard and above recent searches/channels.
AND There is no quantity limit to number of favorited teams. 
AND Icons can run off the screen. 
AND User can scroll to the right to reveal additional teams.

title: Verify Settings screen UI (not signed in)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app is installed
AND user is not Logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN the app is launched
AND user swipes up on remote touchpad
AND user navigate to and activate 'Settings"
custom_expected:
THEN the following should be displayed:
--TV Provider Sign IN
--Fox Sports Sign IN
--Show FOX Deportes Programs
--FAQ
--Feedback
--Captions
--Privacy Policy
--Terms of Use
--Closed Caption Info

title: Verify Settings > MVPD Sign In functionality
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app is installed
AND user is not Logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN the app is launched
AND user swipes up on remote control touch pad to open "Main Menu" drop down.
AND user navigates to "settings"
AND user navigates to and activates  "TV provider Sign in"
AND user follows onscreen instructions to sign in with provider information
custom_expected:
THEN User presented with a confirmation of logging in
AND after pressing "Menu" the user is returned to settings page

Settings Menu:
- TV Provider sign Out
- Fox Sports Sign in
- FAQ
- Feedback
- Captions
- Privacy Policy
- Terms of Use
- Closed Captions Info 

Main Menu:
- Provider logo displayed in main menu top rIght (swipe Up)

title: Verify Settings > Show FOX Deportes functionality
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app is installed
AND user is Logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN the app is launched
AND user swipes up on remote control touch pad to open "Main Menu" drop down.
AND user navigates to "settings"
AND user navigates to and activates  "Show FOX Deportes Programs" = OFF
AND user swipes up on remote control touch pad to open "Main Menu" drop down.
AND user navigates to "Live TV"
AND user traverses the "Live" carousel
custom_expected:
THEN Deportes is not displayed in the Live carousel
And Deportes is not displayed in the "Featured"
And Deportes is not displayed in the "Upcoming"

title: Verify Settings > "FAQ" functionality
custom_preconds: GIVEN the app is installed
custom_steps:
WHEN the app is launched
AND user swipes up on Siri remote touch pad 
AND navigates to "Settings"
AND user navigate to and activates "FAQ"
custom_expected:
THEN user lands on FAQ page.
AND text, font, page in format
AND FAQ information will match http://www.foxsports.com/fsgo-faq
AND tapping "Menu" button returns user to Settings

title: Verify Settings > "Feedback" functionality

WHEN the app is launched

custom_expected:

GIVEN the app is installed
AND user is logged in

AND user swipes up on remote control touch pad to open "Main Menu" drop down.
AND user navigates to "settings"

AND user logins in with email and password

Settings Menu:

title: Verify Settings: Sign Out functionality (signed in)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app is installed
AND user is logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN the app is launched
AND user swipes up on remote touchpad to open up menu
AND user navigates to and activates the "Settings" submenu
custom_expected:
THEN text displays "TV Provider Sign Out"
AND tapping on that option signs user out of MVPD 
AND user is presented with a Sign Out confirmation overlay
AND overlay buttons are "Cancel" and "Sign Out of [Provider]"

title: Scenario: Default LIVE TV page is displayed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has successfully installed the app
AND user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN user launches the app
custom_expected:
THEN default LIVE TV page is displayed
AND "LIVE NOW" carousel is present on top with large tiles
AND "LIVE NOW" carousel tiles autoplay when user hovers over 
AND "FEATURED" is Left Justified below the Live carousel in white text 
AND "FEATURED" section has a row of small tiles with upcoming time and date in yellow text
AND "UPCOMING" is Left Justified below the Featured section in white text
AND  "UPCOMING" is represented with a calendar view. Day and date are left justified with a white selector box. When the user navigates to than activates a day the selector box becomes blue and the corresponding tiles adjust to date allowing the user to navigate by swiping right

title: Scenario: Tile visual display format
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has successfully installed the app
custom_steps:
WHEN user launches the app and navigate the home page
AND live and upcoming tiles
custom_expected:
THEN user will see assets that display:

All Tiles:
*Image representing asset
*Content key icon (if user is not authenticated)
*Channel name top left justified (White text and black box background)

Live:
1. Live and time on first line bottom left of tile (orange time & live text white with orange box)
2. Title on second line bottom left of tile (In focus text is white & out of focus text is grey)
3. When hovered over tiles will autoplay

Upcoming
1. Date and time positioned bottom left of tile (Date and Time text is yellow)
2. Title is left justified under tile (In focus text is white & out of focus text is grey)

title: Scenario: Schedule scrolling changes date color
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has successfully installed and launched the app
AND the user is viewing "UPCOMING" schedule
custom_steps: WHEN the user scrolls through each date on the left and activate a date
custom_expected:
THEN the user should see the color of the focussed date change from light blue text/BG box to dark blue text/white BG box
AND when user activates a date the tiles jump to the date allowing user to swipe right to navigate tiles

title: Scenario: User can activate any date to jump to that day's assets
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has successfully installed and launched the app
AND the user is in "UPCOMING" Calendar
custom_steps:
WHEN the user has navigated to and activated the "Today" calendar date
AND the user navigates to and activates a future date
custom_expected:
THEN activating "today" jumps the user to todays tiles
AND when a future date is activated the user will jump to that dates tiles

title: Scenario: Not avail to watch dialog
custom_preconds: Given the user has successfully installed the app
custom_steps:
When the user launches the app
And the user navigates to Featured section
And the user navigates to and activates a program that is airing in the future
custom_expected: Then the user will see an overlay that states "[Episode Title] will start [Day/Time]"

title: Scenario: Launch video playback if live
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has successfully installed and launched the app
custom_steps:
WHEN The user navigates to Featured section
AND the user navigates to and activates a "Live" thumbnail
custom_expected: THEN the user will be launched into full video playback

title: Verify: Live tiles do not display in Featured section
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has successfully installed and launched the app
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to Featured section
AND View Tiles in the Featured section
custom_expected: THEN No Live tiles display

title: Scenario: Not avail to watch dialog
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has successfully installed the app
custom_steps:
WHEN the user launches the app
AND the user navigates to the Upcoming section 
AND the user navigates to and activates a thumb with a future on air time and date
custom_expected: THEN the user will see an overlay that states "[Episode Title] will start [Day/Time]"

title: Verify: No "Live" tiles are in "Featured" section
custom_preconds: Given the user has successfully installed and launched the app
custom_steps: When the user navigates to Upcoming section
custom_expected: Then No live tiles display in the "Upcoming section"

title: Scenario: Calendar Navigation
custom_preconds: Given the user has successfully installed and launched the app
custom_steps:
When The user navigates to Upcoming section 
AND  user navigates to Calendar dates (on left)
AND  user traverses dates from top to bottom
AND  user selects and activates a day 
AND  user traverses thumbs for day selected by swiping up, down, right and left
AND  user selects and activates a thumb
custom_expected:
Then user is able to swipe up and down allowing user to hover over all dates
AND user is able to press touch pad to activate date and thumbs that move into view air dates match date activated
AND user is able to swipe right, left, up and down to hover over all avail thumbs for the day selected
AND user displayed "[Episode Title] will start [Date and Time]"

title: Verify: Calendar Displayed Date
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has successfully installed the app
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to Upcoming section
AND user navigates to dates
custom_expected:
THEN Day is represented with Today (Not abbreviated) or MON, TUE, Wed, THU, FRI, SAT, or SUN  ( 3 Char abbreviations)
AND Date is represented with  3 char month abbreviations JAN, FEB, MAR, APR, MAY, JUN, JUL, AUG, SEP, NOV, DEC
AND Selected date text is white and has a blue BG
AND None selected text Grey with home screen gradient BG

title: Scenario: Live TV should be ordered by promotional value, not start time
custom_preconds: Given the user has successfully installed the app
custom_steps: WHEN user launches the app
custom_expected:
THEN user sees a hero carousel that displays "LIVE NOW"
AND user can vertically scroll the LIVE NOW section, visual list of assets
AND user sees this list ordered by promotional value, not necessarily chronologically
AND if user activates any asset, user will be taken to full-screen video player of asset

title: Verify: Activating "LIVE" chips will take the user to landscape fullscreen video.
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has successfully installed and launched the app
custom_steps: WHEN the user activates tile by pressing remote touchpad
custom_expected:
THEN user will be taken to the  full-screen video playback
AND video plays successfully

custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has successfully installed and launched the app
AND user has signed in
custom_steps: WHEN the user is viewing content
custom_expected: THEN user will NOT see the "key" icon on assets

title: Scenario: "key" icon when user is NOT authenticated
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has successfully installed and launched the app
AND user is NOT signed in
custom_steps: WHEN the user is viewing content
custom_expected: THEN user will see a "key" icon on all unavailable assets.

title: Scenario: Full Screen
custom_preconds:
Given the user has successfully installed the app
And user has activated a 'Live" thumb and is in full video playback
custom_steps:
When the user swipes up on remote touchpad
AND navigates to the Views "Full Screen" button 
AND navigates down to a listed feed and activates feed
custom_expected:
THEN Views menu animates up from bottom of display
AND "Full Screen" icon changes color to orange with a white selection box encompassing 
AND Listed feeds are formatted correctly and spaced with no overlap
AND User is taken to full video playback when listed feed is activated.

title: Scenario: Picture In Picture
custom_preconds:
Given the user has successfully installed the app
And user has activated a 'Live" thumb and is in full video playback
custom_steps:
WHEN the user swipes up on remote touchpad
AND navigates to and hovers over the Views "PIP" button 
AND user swipes down to activate feeds
AND navigates down to a listed feed and activates one small screen feed (right)
custom_expected:

title: Verify Titles Configurations
custom_expected:
Titles
 
a) For professional and college team events, display team matchup only
    - International Soccer: Manchester City vs. Chelsea
    - All other Team Sports: Jets at Patriots
 
b) For other programs, display program title concatenated with "episode" information as provided by TMS (as is done currently for all programs in FOX Sports GO)
 
d) For non-linear programs, the title that is manually entered when the program is scheduled will be displayed, unless such program falls under the description of (a), in which case, the rules in (a) apply.
 
The ability to manually override (b) with a custom title should be provided
 
More specifically, for team events, we need specific values for the team events to display. The following STATS LLC Fields are to be used:
    - For NFL, MLB, NHL, WNBA, and NBA teams, use STATS LLC          "name"
    - For International Soccer, use STATS LLC "location"
    - For MLS, use STATS LLC "location" concatenated with "name" (separated by a space)
    - For CFB and CBK, use STATS LLC "name"
 
Titles for large chips have a maximum length of 2 lines. If the title extends beyond 2 lines, an ellipsis will appear at the end of the second line (dividing the last word.)
 
Titles for small chips have a maximum of 3 lines.  If the title extends beyond 3 lines, an ellipsis will appear at the end of the third line (dividing the last word.)

title: Verify Sport Tags for EVENTS ONLY
custom_expected:
Content tags must fall under the categories listed below:

-MLB
-NBA
-NHL
-WNBA
-SOCCER
-NCAA FB
-NCAA BK
-UFC
-NASCAR
-GOLF
-LACROSSE

***Please Note: Not all chips will have sports tags.
TMS tags (including but not limited to the tags appearing in the UI above) will be available in Program metadata and searchable via Search.

***Additional tags planned for PHASE I (may require additional backend logic to tag)

-BOXING
-HORSES
-ACTION
-MOTO [motor cycle]
-AUTO
-NHRA
